## Download New Materials

<br> 

1. Open the Terminal lor PC equivalent ( git bash) 

2. `cd` to your local 'R for Bench Biologists' git folder. 

3. Commit your changes from last week. 
  - `git add -A`
  - `git commit -m "your message here"`  eg. 'end of week 3' 
  
4. Getnew files onto your computer 
  - `git pull --rebase origin master` 
  
5. You should now see the newest materials for the wrokshop now in your folder. 

<br> 
<br> 

#### Note: this is how you will regualarly get new course materials, so make sure it works and you are comfortable with it
